items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed loads within 2 seconds on 4G network

items.title: Friends and Following System
items.description: Allow users to connect with friends and follow other users' activities.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow/unfollow other users without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results return within 1 second for up to 10,000 users

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core social features such as activity feed, likes, comments, and friend/follow system. Further clarification needed on gamification, challenges, or integration with external fitness devices.
